fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance readability with a professional aesthetic. It utilizes web-safe fonts for accessibility and consistency.
fontTheory.readability: The combination of Arial for headings and navigation with Georgia for body text ensures good readability across different screen sizes.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Headings are prominent in Arial to establish a clear hierarchy, while body text in Georgia creates a balanced reading experience.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial and Georgia complement each other well, offering a clear distinction between headings and body content while maintaining visual harmony.
